snippet.title: PONG Quest Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to the world of PONG Quest™, a hilarious new take on the seminal arcade smash. Immerse yourself in a PONG® inspired role-playing adventure as a humanized paddle traversing through a variety of themed dungeons, all loosely based on various classic Atari hits.

Battle other paddles using special balls that modernize the classic PONG gameplay and challenge others online with your customized loadout or in classic PONG battles.
